programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep07
programme.desc: In this episode, we will learn how to answer a Part 1 Question from Paper 2, which is the Short Communication Message. Useful answering techniques will be discussed oh how to answer the questions.

programme.desc: In this episode, we will practice answering a Paper 2 question from the Writing Test which is the Note Expansion Question.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep09
programme.desc: We will look at the Speaking Test in Paper 3.The Speaking Test has 3 parts: Part 1, Part 2 and Part 3. Learn some useful skills on how to do well in a Speaking Test.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep10
programme.desc: We will be learning how to answer a Speaking Test and focus on the Part 3 question, which is a discussion task done in pairs. Learn some useful skills on how to do well in a Speaking Test.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 B.Inggeris Ep11
programme.desc: Look at some sample questions from Part 1,choosing the correct picture based on listening to the recording and Part 2, the Matching Sequencing where answers have to based on what is heard in the recording.

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Matematik Ep07

programme.title: Misi Studi PT3 Matematik Ep10
programme.desc: Membincangkan cara menggunakan garis nombor untuk penambahan integer positif dan penambahan integer negatif. Turut disertakan soalan Pengendalian Data dan cara menyelesaikan Rumus Algebra.

programme.desc: Membincangkan soalan daripada bab Nisbah Kadar dan Kadaran dan soalan Garis dan Sudut serta mengenali sudut pelengkap, sudut penggenap dan sudut konjugat

programme.desc: Latihan tambahan soalan Bahagian C dan membincangkan soalan daripada bab Garis Lurus dan cara mencari pintasan-y, pintasan-x dan persamaan garis lurus.

programme.desc: Membincangkan soalan Pengendalian Data berkaitan Plot Batang dan Daun mengetahui definasi dan cara mencari Mod dan Min menggunakan cara paling berkesan.
